name: Aws Albarghouthi
content: Aws Albarghouthi's Homepage My name is Aws Albarghouthi and I'm an associate professor of computer science at the University of Wisconsin-Madison. I study the art and science of program synthesis and verification. I'm a member of the madPL and quantum computing groups. cv Â· blog Â· aws@cs.wisc.edu News 11.25 Our quantum compiler generator is used by Google for early fault tolerance! 10.25 Abtin's paper on qubit routing accepted to POPL! 10.25 Amanda Xu receives the ACM SIGPLAN John Vlissides Award! 10.25 Amanda Xu selected for MIT EECS Rising Stars! 10.25 We gave a tutorial on quantum compilers @ SPLASH! 06.25 Check out the current continuation podcast! 06.25 Excited to join the PLDI steering committee Books FnT 22 Introduction to neural network verification Papers see all papers  Â·
